About Me

Hi, I am Darryen Sands. I have a bachelor’s degree in physics and applied mathematics as well as a master’s degree in computational science. Both of these degrees are from Ontario Tech University. I am interested in many areas such as quantum information, quantitative finance, Markov chain theory, radiation physics, and healthcare.
